trans-unit.source: Provides a representation of the environment of variables and arguments that is available to an activity at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 提供的表示形式的环境变量和自变量是在运行时活动可用的。

trans-unit.source: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 由派生的类构造函数以初始化对象调用。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> objects in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，返回的集合<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>当前范围内的对象。

trans-unit.source: A collection of location reference objects in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 当前作用域中的位置引用对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> is visible in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，确定是否指定<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>在当前范围中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> is visible in the current scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>在当前作用域中可见; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity that determines the scoping rules for this environment.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于确定此环境的范围规则的活动。

trans-unit.source: The activity that determines the scoping rules for this environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定此环境的范围规则的活动。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to get the specified <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，尝试获取指定<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> to retrieve.

When this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, `result` contains the <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> with the specified name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，`result`包含<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>具有指定名称; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref> with the specified name is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReference"></xref>具有指定名称是存在; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
